Package com.enjin.sdk.models.identity

Interface IdentityFragment<T extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>>

Type Parameters:
T - the super type of the interface
All Superinterfaces:
BalanceFragment<T>, GraphQLVariableHolder<T>, TokenFragment<T>, WalletFragment<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
AppFragment<T>, UserFragment<T>
All Known Implementing Classes:
CreateApp, CreateIdentity, CreateUser, DeleteApp, DeleteIdentity, GetApp, GetApps, GetIdentities, GetIdentity, GetUser, GetUsers, OAuthUser, UnlinkApp, UnlinkIdentity, UpdateApp, UpdateIdentity
public interface IdentityFragment<T extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>>
extends GraphQLVariableHolder<T>, WalletFragment<T>
A fragment interface used to include information in a request on the Trusted Platform.
See Also:
IdentitiesService

    Sets the request to include the wallet linked to the identity in the response.
